scripts.==========postinstall: tsc && npm run sam:prod && npm run seed:api
scripts.build:prod: tsc && npm run sam:prod && npm run seed:api
scripts.========gs description========: echo gs = generate schema so `npm run gs` will generate the prisma schema
scripts.========mp description========: echo md = migrate deploy so `npm run mp` will run the migration for prod
scripts.========md description========: echo md = migrate dev so `npm run md` will run the dev migration
scripts.========sam description========: echo run prisma client generator and migrations
scripts.sam: npm run gs && npm run md
scripts.sam:prod: npm run gs && npm run mp
